Articles.Content:
Hello!

Obviously, I am not a modder or I wouldn't be posting about this. Anyway:

I am a huge fan of KSP and even though it is in early access, still love it dearly! I know that there are many plans for KSP, but because they are focusing on completing the career aspect of it, we don't see too many, well... aesthetics. Don't get me wrong, though, the game is very aesthetically pleasing (Who doesn't want to see a huge building crumble into flames after you crash into it!), but there aren't as many changes in the game other than career right now. Basically, I'm looking for a mod that can allow you to chose where you want to have your KSC located from a number of predetermined locations, and allow you to have multiple KSC's under someone else's control (which can go along with some multiplayer mods). There is a mod (KerbTown or something) that lets you place static objects in your world, but to me, that's not what I'm thinking of. I'm thinking of possibly duplicating the terrain around the KSC, the KSC itself, and each function, view, and destructibility script of the KSC and copying it over to a different location. (Not sure if its possible, but worth a try... maybe) Even if the new KSC's are just giving me an excuse not to destroy my own KSC, I still would like to see this implemented, whether in the game itself or in a mod.

Thanks for reading and let me know what you think about this mod!

-MNG

On Real Solar System you can choose where the KSC is placed (I don't know if Kerbol 6.4x do that too).

And in WIP, you can try Kerbal Konstructs with KerbinSide.
